ygData.subject: New Paper on RAAHN, a New Kind of Neural Plasticity
ygData.msgSnippet: I am pleased to announce with my coauthors Justin Pugh and Andrea Soltoggio our new ALIFE conference paper, Real-time Hebbian Learning from Autoencoder
